mapper.insert: insert into diet (diet_id, category, name, kcal, sodium, protein, etc) values (#{diet_id},#{category},#{name},#{kcal},#{sodium},#{protein},#{etc})
mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from diet where ${searchKey} like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from( select diet_id, category, name, kcal, sodium, protein, etc from diet where ${searchKey} like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' order by diet_id desc) data)
where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
mapper.update: update diet set diet_id=#{diet_id}, category=#{category}, name=#{name}, kcal=#{kcal}, sodium=#{protein}, etc=#{etc} where diet_id=#{diet_id}
